name: planktOs
description: Dive into an explorable water world where Elders are mysteriously being trapped in crystal prisons. The freedom of the elders depends on a single naive little spirit to explore and find a way to release them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i5-4660S 2.9 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 240 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-3770 3.5 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 Storage: 3 GB available space
